thread.section_title: Jomashop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Jomashop | www.jomashop.com
thread.title: Jason Duma

author: Jason Duma
title: Jason Duma
text: Awesome price on Movado watches. The watch was all I expected and delivered on time as promised. The only draw back was when I had to call customer service. I had been offered a coupon for signing up to receive email deals, and it wasn't applied right away. I called customer service and the rep was very rude on the phone. I received my credit, and will order again from the website. I can deal with the rudeness as long as the site delivers what they do what they promise.
